app.name: Myrient Search
app.description: Myrient no tame no kensaku enjin - Erista ni yoru bideo gēmu hozon wo mokuteki to shita sābisu.
app.tagline: Myrient wa jikan no nagare to tomo ni ushinawarenai you, seiton sareta koukai gēmu korekushon wo teikyou shiteimasu.

search.indexing: Indeksu sakusei chū desu. Risuto ni hyōji sarenai mono ga aru baai wa, sūfun go ni saikenshite kudasai
search.non_game_filter: Hi-gēmu kontentsu fuiruta ga yūkō desu
search.old_experience: Kyū kensaku taiken wo shiyō chū desu.
search.new_experience: Atarashii kensaku taiken wo shiyō chū desu.

about.title: Saito ni tsuite
about.support: Kono purojekuto ga ki ni itta nara, Myrient he no sapōto mo go kōryō kudasai:

emulator.title: Tōsai Emyurēta
emulator.description: Kono saito niwa EmulatorJS wo riyō shita tōsai emyurēta ga ari, retoro gēmu wo burazua jō de chokusetsu purei dekimasu.
emulator.compatibility: Taiō gēmu wa kensaku kekka pēji ni purei botan ga hyōji saremasu.
emulator.browser_tip: Saiteki na gēmu taiken wo eru tame ni, hādouea akuserarēshon wo yūkō ni shita Chromium bēsu no burazua wo goriyō kudasai.
emulator.save_states: Gēmu wa Myrient no kōkai ākaibu kara chokusetsu yomikoma remasu. Sēbu dēta wa burazua ni rōkaru hozon saremasu.
emulator.limitations: ROM hakku, saundotorakku, sono ta no hi-gēmu kontentsu wa emyurēta de sapōto sareteorazu, yomikomi ni shippai suru kanōsei ga arimasu.
emulator.disabled: Webu emyurēta kinō wa kanrisha ni yotte mukouka sareteimasu.
emulator.contact: Kanrisha ni otoiawase itadaku ka, go jishin de Myrient Search no insutansu wo tachiagetekudasai.

metadata.title: Metadēta Jōhō
metadata.description: Kono websaito wa {{metadata_source}} kara gēmu no metadēta jōhō wo shutoku shiteimasu. ROM no namae no fuicchi ya sābisu purobaida no mondai ni yori, ichibu no metadēta ga ketsujo shiteiru ka, fuseikaku na baai ga arimasu.

search_columns.title: Kensaku Karamu
search_columns.tooltip: Kensaku enjin ga kensaku wo okonau karamu wo sentaku shimasu.

score_multiplier.title: Kensaku Sukoa Bairitsu
score_multiplier.tooltip: Mitsukerareta tango no kategorī ni motozuite, matchi sukoa wo chōsei shimasu.

fuzzy.label: Aimai Kensaku
fuzzy.tooltip: Tango ga icchi to minasareru tame no rubaenshuhtain kyori wo 0.00~1.00 no aida de settei shimasu. Takai chi hodo, yori yuruyaka na icchi ga kyoka saremasu. 0 de mukouka ni narimasu.

prefix.label: Settōji Icchi wo Kyoka
prefix.tooltip: Tango no sentan bubun deno icchi wo kyoka shimasu.

match_all.label: Subete no Tango wo Icchi
match_all.tooltip: Kensaku kueri no subete no tango ga icchi suru hitsuyō ga arimasu.

hide_non_game.label: Hi-gēmu Kontentsu wo Hyōji Shinai
hide_non_game.tooltip: ROM hakku, patchi, ātowāku, sono ta no gēmu igai no kontentsu wo kensaku kekka kara jokyo shimasu.

use_old_results.label: Kyū Kensaku
use_old_results.tooltip: Kensaku kekka wo kyū tēburu keishiki ni redirekuto shimasu. Kore wa metadēta no shutoku wo sukippu suru tame, yori hayaku rōdo saremasu.

error.loading: Gēmu no yomikomi ni shippai shimashita
error.no_rom: Ākaibu nai ni ROM fairu ga mitsukarimasen

warning.non_game: Chuui: Kono fairu wa geemu ROM de wa nai kanousei ga ari, web emyureetaa de tadashiku dousa shinai baai ga arimasu.
warning.see_about: Kuwashii jouhou wa {{link}} peeji wo goran kudasai.
warning.https: Anzen denai HTTP setsuzoku: Ichibu no emyureetaa wa seijou ni dousa suru tame ni HTTPS ga hitsuyou desu. Kono saito wa tadashiku settei sarete imasen.

console.about: Kore wa Myrient no kōkai ākaibu kara chokusetsu gēmu wo jikkō suru onrain emyurēta desu.
console.disclaimer: Kono saito ni gēmu ROM wa hozon sareteorimasen. Subete no kontentsu wa Myrient sāba kara chokusetsu yomikoma remasu.
console.more_info: Kono sābisu ni tsuite no kuwashii jōhō wa, saito ni tsuite no pēji wo goran kudasai.

emulator.disclaimer: Kono emyurēta wa {{link}} kara chokusetsu gēmu wo yomikomi masu. Kuwashiku wa {{about}} pēji wo goran kudasai.
emulator.not_available_tooltip: Kono taitoru wa gēmu de wa nai ka, purattofōmu ga sapōto sarete inai tame, webu emyurēshon wa riyō dekimasen.

welcome.title: AI Ashisutanto
welcome.description: Retoro geemu no kensaku, geemu no suisen, kensaku enjin no shiyouhouhou ni kansuru shitsumon ni otae dekimasu.

suggestions.game_recommendations: Nintendo 64 ni osusume no geemu wa arimasu ka?
suggestions.search_tips: Tokutei no chiiki de kensaku suru ni wa dou sureba ii desu ka?
suggestions.gaming_history: Retoro geemu ki ni tsuite oshiete kudasai

error.network: AI saabisu ni setsuzoku dekimasen. Intaanetto setsuzoku wo kakunin shite, mou ichido otameshi kudasai.
error.generic: Moushiwake gozaimasen ga, genzai setsuzoku ni mondai ga arimasu. Nochihodo saido otameshi kudasai.
